Nightlight::


Nighlight smiled shyly and she moved dificultly to ride at the bot. 
Suddenly her mind started to remember the words and she tried to 
spoke.

"Tha... thak" she spoke as if she tried to remember something that he 
had forgotten "Thanks."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He nods looking at Nightlight.  He walks over and leans 
forward "If you 
> would like a ride allow me to give you a hand."  He reaches out 
with one hand 
> to help her up, his other hand he offers to Trinity "I shall carry 
you this 
> time, little one."
